data.text: @Jasonwalls92 @oliverhartwich More to the point, why wasn't it mentioned that The Ginger Winger was at a Rodeo in Texas, the recent MAFS revelations and that Ringo has been spotted wearing Lennon-esque glasses that is what I want to know.
@oliverhartwich Given Russia has just declared us not their friend anymore, the risk of New Zealand becoming a target has increased.

@Jasonwalls92 Okay, where is it? And have you had a look at the New York Times, the Times of London, Die Welt, The Daily Telegraph (UK) today? Their front pages are practically about nothing else but the war and its implications. Sorry, not good enough for a newspaper of record.
@oliverhartwich Coooome onnnnnn - the Herald's had extensive coverage of the invasion since day one.
@oliverhartwich To be fair, in the event of a nuclear war actually occurring the Herald would lead with it’s likely impact on house prices so not sticking their heads in the sand entirely
